title: <Gameplay> Vel Koz Visual Bug
body: Was playing a game of ARAM as Arclight Vel Koz. Everything was going fine until I died. Upon respawn and the remained of the game, the tentacles on the model disappeared. Not sure if its specific to this skin or what the circumstances surrounding it are, but considering the game just got patched I think this is a new bug.

replies.body:
Hey NightRang3r! 

This is a known issue and we're currently investigating! 

Thanks for the report!
